summary.para: Utility that manages asset monitoring features of UI Toolkit panels.
Gets the state that controls if the panel of the EditorWindow should reset its rendering data when an asset changes.
Sets the state that controls if the panel of the EditorWindow should reset its rendering data when an asset changes.
Attribute that can be used on an assembly to define an XML namespace prefix for a namespace.

member.name: M:UnityEditor.UIElements.UxmlNamespacePrefixAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.param: The XML/C# namespace to which a prefix will be associated.
The prefix to associate to the namespace.
